text: Lately, every year seems weirder than the one before. And 2018 is no exception. On December 19, 2017, Saturn, the planet of structure, moved into its own sign ( Capricorn ), kicking off three years of seriously hard work. Things feel tougher in the short term, but it ’ s because we ’ re finally dealing with them head - on. Jupiter, the blabbermouth planet, began spilling Scorpio ’ s dark secrets last October and will keep it up through November 2018. In regular - people speak? This means sexual harassment and violence will continue to be a major global conversation. Jupiter tends to improve things, so we might see real justice — but we won ’ t know for sure until the end of the year.
